# examples of plotly

老鼠

## scatterplot

dataset %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~variable, y = ~variable, color = ~variable, text = ~variable, 
          type = "scatter", mode = "markers")
          
## boxplot

dataset %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~variable, x = ~variable, color = ~variable, type = "box")
  

## ggplotly

scatterplot = dataset %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = , y = , color = )) + 
  geom(scatter)

ggplotly(scatterplot)
